subproject.description: The ART Gold Sri Lanka Programme (AGSL) creates and supports innovative partnerhsips within a global system of cooperatio that links local, national and international actors. it enables them to work together more effectively towards achiveing the MDGs through an area-based approach to governance and development. Participants include donor countries, UN agencies, Governments at nationak, regional and local level, cities, decentralized cooperation actors, associations, universities, private sector organizations and NGOs. In line with the overall ART approach, AGSL will address all three levels - local, national, international - in order to build partnerships for development. AGSL is financed by a multitude of decentralized cooperation actors mainly from Spain but also from Italy. Through AGSL these decentralized actors work towards the achievements of the MDG's in Sri Lanka not only by financing the Programme but also through engaging into long-term partnships geared at exchanging experience and technical Knowledge.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: ART GOLD SRI LANKA
